properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 3:15PM EST until February 14 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with occasional gusts up to
35 kt and seas 7 to 10 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Cape Lookout to Surf City.

* WHEN...From 1 AM Thursday to 7 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY
